transcription.text: Thank you for calling New Dimensions in Technology. For Beverly Kahn, press 113. For Larry Kahn, press 115. You have reached Beverly Kahn's voicemail at extension 113. Please leave a message. Hey Beverly, it's Jim Lombardo with PC Recruiter. I wanted to give you a quick call to follow up with you. I got your inquiry this morning through our website. Thought I'd give you a quick call to follow up and see how I can help you learn more about PC Recruiter. If you have any questions or if you might like to get a demonstration on the schedule. If you would, give me a quick call. Let me know. My phone number is 440-856-0314. That's 440-856-0314. I'll send you an email as well. Hopefully we can connect soon. Thanks for everything. Take care. Bye-bye.
